src:
Sita Aset Yayasan Supersemar, Dwi Sugiarto Masuk Bursa Hakim Agung
06 Nov 2019, 09:42 by Andi Saputra
Jakarta - Saat menjadi Ketua Pengadilan Negeri Jakarta Selatan (PN Jaksel), Dwi Sugiarto mengeksekusi sejumlah aset Yayasan Supersemar. Kini, Dwi lolos ke tahap wawancara calon hakim agung.
Nama Dwi diumumkan Komisi Yudisial (KY) bersama 13 nama lain pada, Selasa (5/11/2019) kemarin. Saat ini ini Dwi adalah hakim tinggi pada Pengadilan Tinggi (PT) Denpasar.
Sebelum menjadi haki tinggi PT Denpasar, ia menjabat sebagai Ketua PN Jaksel. Meski terbilang singkat menjadi Ketua PN Jaksel, ia melakukan sejumlah eksekusi yang menarik perhatian publik, seperti kasus Yayasan Supersemar.
Dwi melakukan sita terhadap aset Gedung Granadi di Jalan HR Rasuna Said kav 8-9 blok X-I, Kuningan Timur, Jakarta Selatan pada awal Januari 2018. Aset lainnya yang disita adalah sebidang tanah di Jalan Megamendung nomor 6 RT 3 RW 3 Kampung Citalingkup, Desa Megamendung, Bogor seluas 8.120 meter persegi.
Kedua aset tersebut nantinya akan dilelang oleh Kantor Pelayanan Kekayaan Negara dan Lelang. Namun saat ini kedua aset itu masih dalam tahap apraisal atau penilaian harga aset yang dilakukan Kejaksaan Agung.
Dwi juga melakukan sita eksekusi dan blokir rekening. Setelah itu ditunjuk panitera dan juru sita untuk melaksanakan putusan eksekusi tersebut. Saat ini proses pencairan sebagian rekening Yayasan Supersemar telah berjalan. Rekening-rekening tersebut secara bertahap dicairkan ke bank yang dimaksud.
Nantinya setelah rekening dicairkan seluruhnya dan aset telah dilelang, PN Jaksel akan menyerahkan ke Kejagung untuk dikembalikan ke negara. Adapun aset yang disita dari yayasan Supersemar senilai Rp 4,4 triliun. Angka itu berdasarkan putusan Mahkamah Agung (MA).
Saat menjadi hakim di PN Jakpus pada 2010, Dwi Sugiarto pernah menangani kasus niaga royalti bisnis karaoke Inul Vista milik Inul Daratista. Inul kala itu menggandeng Hotman Paris Hutapea. Di kasus itu, Dwi menolak gugatan para pencipta lagu ke Inul.
Berikut 14 nama yang lolos ke tahap selanjutnya adalah:
1. Ahmad Choiri (Ketua Pengadilan Tinggi Agama Samarinda)
2. Busra (Ketua Pengadilan Tinggi Agama Kupang).
3. Dwi Sugiarto (hakim tinggi Pengadilan Tinggi Denpasar)
4. Maryana (hakim tinggi Pengadilan Tinggi Yogyakarta)
5. Rahmi Mulyati (panitera muda perdata khusus MA)
6. Sumpeno (hakim tinggi Pengadilan Tinggi Denpasar).
7. Artha Theresia Silalahi (hakim tinggi Pengadilan Tinggi Pelambang)
8. Soesilo (hakim tinggi Pengadilan Tinggi Banjarmasin).
9. Kolonel Sus Reki Irene Lumme (hakim tinggi Badan Pengawasan MA)
10. Brigjen TNI Sugeng Sutrisno (hakim militer utama Dilmiltama)
12. Kolonel Tiarsen Buaton (dosen Sekolah Tinggi Hukum Militer Ditkumad).
13. Sartono (Wakil Ketua III Pengadilan Pajak Bidang Pembinaan dan Pengawasan Kinerja Hakim)
14. Triyono Martanto (hakim Pengadilan Pajak).

(asp/mae)
text:
Sita Aset Foundation Supersemar, Dwi Sugiarto Enter the Supreme Court Exchange
Nov 6 2019, 09:42 by Andi Saputra
Jakarta - When he was Chairman of the South Jakarta District Court (PN South Jakarta), Dwi Sugiarto executed a number of assets from the Supersemar Foundation. Now, Dwi passes to the interview stage of prospective justices.
Dwi's name was announced by the Judicial Commission (KY) along with 13 other names on Tuesday (5/11/2019) yesterday. Currently Dwi is a high judge at the High Court (PT) of Denpasar.
Before becoming a high-ranking person of PT Denpasar, he served as Chairman of the South Jakarta District Court. Although he was briefly the Chairperson of South Jakarta District Court, he carried out a number of executions that drew public attention, such as the Supersemar Foundation case.
Dwi confiscated the assets of the Granadi Building on Jalan HR Rasuna Said kav 8-9 block XI, Kuningan Timur, South Jakarta in early January 2018. Another asset confiscated was a plot of land on Jalan Megamendung number 6 RT 3 RW 3 Kampung Citalingkup, Megamendung Village , Bogor area of 8,120 square meters.
Both assets will be auctioned off by the Office of State Assets and Auction Services. However, currently the two assets are still in the appraisal stage or asset price assessment conducted by the Attorney General's Office.
Dwi also seized execution and blocked accounts. After that the clerk and the bailiff are appointed to carry out the execution decision. At present the process of disbursement of part of the Supersemar Foundation account is already underway. These accounts are gradually disbursed to the bank in question.
Later after the account is fully disbursed and assets have been auctioned off, South Jakarta District Court will submit it to the Attorney General's Office to be returned to the state. As for the assets seized from the Supersemar foundation worth Rp4.4 trillion. That number is based on the decision of the Supreme Court (MA).
When he was a judge at the Central Jakarta District Court in 2010, Dwi Sugiarto once handled the Inul Vista karaoke business royalty royalties case. Inul at that time took Hotman Paris Hutapea. In that case, Dwi refused the lawsuit of the songwriters to Inul.
The following 14 names that pass to the next stage are:
1. Ahmad Choiri (Chair of Samarinda High Court of Religion)
2. Busra (Chair of the Kupang High Court of Religion).
3. Dwi Sugiarto (high judge of the Denpasar High Court)
4. Maryana (High Judge of the Yogyakarta High Court)
5. Rahmi Mulyati (young civil registrar specifically MA)
6. Sumpeno (high judge of the Denpasar High Court).
7. Artha Theresia Silalahi (High Judge of the Court of Appeal)
8. Soesilo (high judge of Banjarmasin High Court).
9. Colonel Sus Reki Irene Lumme (Supreme Judge of the Supreme Court Supervisory Agency)
10. Brigadier General Sugeng Sutrisno (main military judge Dilmiltama)
12. Colonel Tiarsen Buaton (lecturer at the Ditkumad Military Law School).
13. Sartono (Deputy Chair III of the Tax Court for Guiding and Supervising the Performance of Judges)
14. Triyono Martanto (judge of the Tax Court).

(asp / mae)
